variants.name: brass
variants.full_name: Brass Gauntlets of the Bold
variants.description: These gauntlets emit a soft glow, said to embolden the heart of the wearer, reminiscent of the bravery shown by knights in countless tales.

variants.name: bronze
variants.full_name: Bronze Gauntlets of the Ancient Protector
variants.description: Etched with timeless runes, these gauntlets grant the wisdom of ancient protectors, providing both defense and ancient knowledge.

variants.name: ceramic
variants.full_name: Ceramic Cuffs of the Silent Step
variants.description: Favored by elven scouts, these light ceramic cuffs enhance stealth and agility, perfect for silent maneuvers.

variants.name: copper
variants.full_name: Copper Vambraces of the Stormcaller
variants.description: These copper vambraces crackle with stored electrical energy, occasionally sparking with the raw power of a tempest.

variants.name: gold
variants.full_name: Golden Gloves of the Sun Warrior
variants.description: Radiating a warm, golden light, these gloves are said to contain the very essence of the sun, empowering the wearer with unmatched vitality.

variants.name: iron
variants.full_name: Iron Bindings of the Minotaur
variants.description: Thick and almost impenetrable, these iron gloves offer incredible protection and augment the wearer's physical strength, akin to that of a minotaur.

variants.name: silver
variants.full_name: Silver Wristguards of the Moonlit Walker
variants.description: These shimmering silver wristguards grant the wearer enhanced night vision and agility, ideal for movements shrouded in darkness.

variants.name: steel
variants.full_name: Steel Gloves of the Orcish Guard
variants.description: Made from the finest orc-forged steel, these gloves are nearly indestructible, providing superb protection in combat.

variants.name: black
variants.full_name: Black Gloves of the Shadow
variants.description: These dark gloves are favored by thieves and assassins, blending perfectly with the shadows to render the wearer nearly invisible.

variants.name: blue
variants.full_name: Blue Gloves of the Deep Waters
variants.description: Infused with the essence of ocean depths, these blue gloves allow the wearer to manipulate water, granting abilities akin to those of aquatic creatures.

variants.name: bluegray
variants.full_name: Bluegray Gloves of the Stormy Skies
variants.description: These gloves resonate with the power of stormy skies, occasionally sparking with static energy, enhancing electrical attacks.

variants.name: brown
variants.full_name: Brown Leather Gloves of the Earth
variants.description: Crafted from thick, durable leather, these brown gloves provide resilience and a natural connection to the earth, enhancing earth-related abilities.

variants.name: charcoal
variants.full_name: Charcoal Gloves of the Smoldering Fire
variants.description: These gloves are imbued with a smoldering fire, providing warmth and protection, and can ignite flammable materials with a touch.

variants.name: forest
variants.full_name: Forest Gloves of the Woodland Ranger
variants.description: These gloves are made from materials harvested from the deepest woods, providing camouflage and an affinity with forest creatures.

variants.name: gray
variants.full_name: Gray Gloves of the Mist
variants.description: These gloves are cloaked in an ever-present mist, obscuring the wearer's hands and confusing their foes, perfect for deception.

variants.name: green
variants.full_name: Green Gloves of the Forest Guardian
variants.description: Enchanted with the vitality of the green forests, these gloves can accelerate the growth of plants and heal minor wounds.

variants.name: lavender
variants.full_name: Lavender Gloves of the Healer
variants.description: These delicately scented gloves enhance the wearer's healing abilities, often used by clerics and healers in sacred rituals.

variants.name: leather
variants.full_name: Leather Gloves of the Prowler
variants.description: Crafted from supple leather, these gloves provide the perfect balance of flexibility and protection, ideal for stealthy movements.

variants.name: maroon
variants.full_name: Maroon Gloves of the Warlord
variants.description: Dyed in the blood of fallen foes, these maroon gloves are a symbol of power and authority, often worn by feared warlords.

variants.name: navy
variants.full_name: Navy Gloves of the Ocean's Commander
variants.description: These deep blue gloves carry the calm of the ocean, providing strategic insights and a command over sea creatures.

variants.name: orange
variants.full_name: Orange Gloves of the Blazing Sun
variants.description: Bright as the midday sun, these gloves imbue the wearer with fiery energy, enhancing stamina and heat resistance.

variants.name: pink
variants.full_name: Pink Gloves of the Enchanter
variants.description: These charming pink gloves are imbued with enchanting powers, making them a favorite among mages for casting complex spells.

variants.name: purple
variants.full_name: Purple Gloves of the Mystic
variants.description: Shrouded in mystery, these purple gloves are said to enhance magical abilities and are sought after by sorcerers and mystics.

variants.name: red
variants.full_name: Red Gloves of the Flame Dancer
variants.description: These vibrant red gloves can summon and manipulate fire, dancing with flames as if part of a fiery ballet.

variants.name: rose
variants.full_name: Rose Gloves of the Gentle Touch
variants.description: Infused with the gentle essence of roses, these gloves are known to soothe pain and calm the spirit, beloved by healers and peacemakers.

variants.name: sky
variants.full_name: Sky Gloves of the High Winds
variants.description: These light blue gloves are as light as the sky itself, allowing the wearer to move with the speed and grace of the wind.

variants.name: slate
variants.full_name: Slate Gloves of the Mountain
variants.description: Crafted from the rocks of the highest peaks, these slate gloves grant incredible strength and resilience, echoing the unyielding spirit of the mountains.

variants.name: tan
variants.full_name: Tan Gloves of the Desert Nomad
variants.description: These sand-colored gloves are designed for survival in harsh desert climates, providing resistance to extreme heat and aiding in sand navigation.

variants.name: teal
variants.full_name: Teal Gloves of the Riverwalker
variants.description: Merging the hues of green and blue, these gloves allow the wearer to tread on water as if walking on land, harnessing the fluidity of rivers.

variants.name: walnut
variants.full_name: Walnut Gloves of the Forest Forger
variants.description: These sturdy gloves, crafted from walnut wood, provide exceptional protection and a deep connection to the forest, enhancing woodworking and crafting skills.

variants.name: white
variants.full_name: White Gloves of the Frost Guardian
variants.description: These pristine white gloves are imbued with the power of ice, capable of freezing objects with a mere touch, guarding against the harshest of winters.

variants.name: yellow
variants.full_name: Yellow Gloves of the Lightning Hand
variants.description: These bright yellow gloves crackle with electrical energy, empowering the wearer to harness and wield bolts of lightning.
